name: Elemental Playground
description:
Welcome to Elemental Playground, a falling sand game where you can explore the magical world of elements and materials.
Mix, match, and experiment with different elements like sand, fire, and water, and watch as they react and interact.

Create your own virtual laboratory and let your imagination run wild as you discover new reactions and effects.
Play with fire and watch as it spreads and engulfs everything in its path. Add water to the mix and see how it affects the fire, putting it out.

Pour sand on top of it all and create new landscapes and structures. Or blow everything up if you like.

This game is perfect for players of all ages who love to tinker and experiment.

So, what are you waiting for? Dive into Elemental Playground and let your creativity soar!

Feel free to share your ideas on new materials and reactions.
